myexpertpay.containers.FeaturePage.feedb:
Enjoy the best DX and code your app at the speed of thought! Your
    saved changes to the CSS and JS are reflected instantaneously
    without refreshing the page. Preserve application state even when
    you update something in the underlying code!
myexpertpay.containers.FeaturePage.inter: Scalable apps need to support multiple languages, easily add and support multiple languages with `react-intl`.
myexpertpay.containers.FeaturePage.javas:
Use template strings, object destructuring, arrow functions, JSX
    syntax and more, today.
myexpertpay.containers.FeaturePage.netwo:
The next frontier in performant web apps: availability without a
      network connection from the instant your users load the app.
myexpertpay.containers.FeaturePage.routi:
Write composable CSS that's co-located with your components for
    complete modularity. Unique generated class names keep the
    specificity low while eliminating style clashes. Ship only the
    styles that are on the page for the best performance.
myexpertpay.containers.FeaturePage.scaff:
Automate the creation of components, containers, routes, selectors
  and sagas - and their tests - right from the CLI!
myexpertpay.containers.FeaturePage.state:
Unidirectional data flow allows for change logging and time travel
    debugging.
myexpertpay.containers.BankAccount.scaff: Below is a list of your bank accounts. To edit/delete an account, click on the account row and select from the dropdown menu. To validate an account not yet verified please click on the account row and select "Verify" from the dropdown menu. To add a new bank account, select "New Bank Account."
myexpertpay.containers.BankAccount.addBa: By add bank account, you accept the General Condition & Confidentiality Rules
myexpertpay.containers.Payment.addBankMe: By add bank account, you accept the General Condition & Confidentiality Rules
myexpertpay.containers.HomePage.start_pr: Start your next react project in seconds
A highly scalable, offline-first foundation with the best DX and a focus on performance and best practices
